titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States respecting the right to decent and affordable housing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

bill.summary: 1/6/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - States that all U.S. citizens shall have a right to decent and affordable housing, which shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or any State.
